name: Animus (itch)
description:
Child of Global Game Jam. In almost four days we completed this project. 
In Animus the character has lost his memories and tries to get them back only to realize that he is in a coma... Will he wake up ?

Currently the concept of animus is being remastered. It will still be a 2D platformer but with new custom made sound, artwork, mechanics, updated story and gameplay ! Also more platforms that you can play it on. 

Support us on KICKSTARTER
